body_content.explanation: one of two or more people who officially own something:
examples: Several people appear as coholders of the account.

body_content.explanation: one of two or more people, organizations, places, etc. that have officially done something faster, better, more, etc. than any other:
examples: He is co-holder of the record in the 110-meter hurdles.
About 19% of people have ended their marriages in the town, making it co-holder of the title "divorce capital of the country."
